code: /*Regex for validate the exact match*/export var verifyAlpha=function verifyAlpha(value){var alphaRex=new RegExp('^[ A-Za-z]{1,250}$');return alphaRex.test(value);};export var verifyString=function verifyString(value){var string=new RegExp('[-_ a-zA-Z0-9]{1,250}');return string.test(value);};
